name: Root Them All (and in the family bind them)
name_original: Root Them All (and in the family bind them)
description:
Drag portraits to fill the family tree and validate by clicking on "My Family" plate at the bottom of the screen.

Fill the tree in a single try to get a "S" rank!

You can also test character positions to "lock" the good ones but it will lower your ranking.

-------------------------------------------------------

Two (rusty) programmers get back together for the Global Game Jam 2023 - Theme: "Roots"

The result is a small puzzle game with 2 levels (+1 for tutorial) with images generated with Midjourney AI.

We hope you will enjoy our game!
